ygData.subject: Re: Red Dragonscale Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that s the point.  The stats on the armor are INCREDIBLE! Definately gotta be high level material.  The cash issue will be outta the way, easily, by
ygData.messageBody:
I think that's the point. The stats on the armor are INCREDIBLE!
Definately gotta be high level material. The cash issue will be outta the
way, easily, by level 35 for me. (28 now). Vox... well, did I mention high
level material? : )

BTW, I don't seem to be noticing any effect off Pixie Strike.... Message
says something to the effect of "Eyes glaze over" then immediately after "An
Ogre Shaman hits you for 48 pts of damage"

Is this not working or is that the feeble attempt of stun I get at level 28?
: )


Darkfox Reven'tsol of Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: Robin Wise 3 <eurmali@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 5:59 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Red Dragonscale Armor


> From: "Robin Wise 3" <eurmali@...>
>
> > Date: Fri, 29 Oct 1999 15:50:36 -0600
> > From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
> >Subject: RE: New goodies from Kedge Keep and other places ****SP
OILER****
> >
> >The Dragonscale armor sounded sweet as well - I saw that it was quest
> >obtained and my jaw nearly dropped from my skull. Unfortunately, it
> >requires an item that I have a snowballs chance in hell of getting and I
> >have no idea what the Vial of Swirling Mist is, or where it comes from?
> >Any ideas?
>
> If I remember correctly, the Vial of Swirling Smoke is the famous Gate
> Potion, sold in Kelethin for the reasonable and economically feasible
price
> of 1000pp, give or take a hundred. = ) I believe it is also sold
elsewhere
> (East Freeport?) but I do recall seeing it in Kelethin. Sooo to get this
> armor all you need is roughly 2000pp... oh, and you have to kill Nagafen.
> Sign me up!
>
> Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
